title: Milky Way International Trading Corp. Recalls Canned Corned Beef Products Imported Without Benefit of Inspection
summary: Editor’s note: This recall was updated on March 26, 2021 to reflect corrections to the product best by dates and additional can codes in the attached chart. Milky Way International Trading Corp., doing business as MW Polar, a Norwalk, Calif., firm, is recalling approximately 297,715...
impacted_products: Ox & Palm Corned Beef Original Chunky Style
Ox & Palm Sita Camp Pie Luncheon Loaf
Ox & Palm Corned Beef with Juices - Onion
Ox & Palm Corned Beef with Juices - Chili & Garlic
